message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mixed-to-weak session across mid/small caps. PSU banks and metals softened (IDBI, UCO, IOB, HINDCOPPER), while momentum held in select financials and AMC/tower plays (SUNDARMFIN, HDFCAMC, INDUSTOWER) and building products (ASTRAL). Notable wide-range declines in VOLTAS, ZYDUSLIFE, DELHIVERY; constructive strength/breakout attempts in ASTRAL, HDFCAMC, INDUSTOWER. Portfolio closed +0.94% led by LAURUSLABS and LTF; risk flag on IDBI and BHEL.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Buy on breakout > ₹404", "reason": "Strong close with heavy volume; consolidation just below round number; potential continuation if 404/405 clears.", "price": 398.30},
    {"symbol": "ASTRAL", "signal": "Buy on dip or on breakout", "reason": "Range expansion up on very high volume; consider dips to 1535–1550 or strength >1575 with tight stop.", "price": 1566.10},
    {"symbol": "HDFCAMC", "signal": "Buy on strength/dips", "reason": "Bullish candle from opening lows; momentum in AMCs. Add on dips ~5330–5360 or >5400 with stop near 5230.", "price": 5388.50},
    {"symbol": "SUNDARMFIN", "signal": "Buy on dip", "reason": "Trend intact; higher highs with strong close. Prefer entries near 4780–4820 with stop under 4700.", "price": 4858.40},
    {"symbol": "MANAPPURAM", "signal": "Buy on dip", "reason": "Momentum day closing near highs with good volume; look for 270–272 pullback, stop ~263.", "price": 274.00},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Buy on breakout > ₹1538", "reason": "Tight consolidation with slight up-close; market infra remains resilient; potential push toward 1600.", "price": 1532.90},
    {"symbol": "KPITTECH", "signal": "Buy above ₹1162", "reason": "Held firm; tech auto-theme strength. Break above day high could extend trend.", "price": 1159.20},
    {"symbol": "AUBANK", "signal": "Breakout watch > ₹892.7", "reason": "Tight range near resistance; clean trigger above day high for continuation.", "price": 881.00},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Trail SL / Add on strength", "reason": "Strong relative strength; trail stop near 959 to lock gains; potential add above 995.", "price": 979.80},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Hold; breakout watch > ₹2496", "reason": "Consolidation day; structure intact. Trail risk near 2415.", "price": 2455.50},
    {"symbol": "VOLTAS", "signal": "Avoid new longs / breakdown risk", "reason": "Wide-range down day closing near lows; watch 1288 support—below it, momentum likely accelerates.", "price": 1292.40},
    {"symbol": "ZYDUSLIFE", "signal": "Avoid longs near-term", "reason": "Wide bearish bar from 998 to 937 closing near lows; wait for stabilization above 950.", "price": 936.70},
    {"symbol": "DELHIVERY", "signal": "Avoid catching knife", "reason": "Gap down and heavy selloff with very high volume; need base back above 450 for safer long.", "price": 442.60},
    {"symbol": "CHOLAFIN", "signal": "Watch for reversal only", "reason": "Large intraday drop into 1653–1680 support zone; buy only on a clear bullish reversal candle.", "price": 1683.40}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "action": "Sell", "reason": "PSU banks weak across board; IDBI closed near day low and lost the ₹100 handle. Protect capital if breakdown extends.", "quantity": 10, "price": 95.90}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 806.30,
    "total_value": 26206.30,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units",
      "LTF: 30 units",
      "BEL: 20 units",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units",
      "BHEL: 10 units",
      "IDBI: 10 units"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU banks weak: UNIONBANK, IDBI, UCO, IOB, CENTRALBK all slipped; keep exposure light and use tight stops.",
    "Capital goods/consumer durables under pressure: VOLTAS and ESCORTS showed wide-range declines; HAVELLS softer—prefer strength confirmation before any buys.",
    "Healthcare mixed: LAURUSLABS strong; ZYDUSLIFE and METROPOLIS printed weak candles—focus on relative strength names within pharma.",
    "Market infra: BSE held up; CDSL constructive; MCX eased—bias positive for exchange/depository theme.",
    "Renewables/power: NHPC, SJVN drifted; WAAREEENER steady near highs—watch a clean breakout >3415.",
    "Rail/defence: RVNL, IRCON, GRSE soft; HAL steady; avoid fresh buys in rail PSU pack until momentum returns.",
    "Logistics: DELHIVERY had a heavy breakdown with very high volume; AEGISLOG more stable with upward bias >772.",
    "Autos/auto-IT: ASHOKLEY flat; KPITTECH held strength—prefer buys above day highs.",
    "Financials: LTF mild pullback but trend intact; SUNDARMFIN strong; SBICARD weak and hovering near support.",
    "Staples/FMCG: DABUR, MARICO stable; GODREJCP modestly lower—no clear edge.",
    "Metals/chemicals: HINDCOPPER weak; SHYAMMETL volatile; TATACHEM eased; DEEPAKNTR/NAVINFLUOR range-bound—avoid chasing.",
    "IT services: COFORGE/MPHASIS/PERSISTENT steady; OFSS softer; TATAELXSI underperformed.",
    "Real estate: PRESTIGE/OBEROIRLTY slightly lower; keep watch for sector cues before adding.",
    "Building products: ASTRAL showed a strong, high-volume breakout—top quality candidate on dips.",
    "Data note: Received 127 of 140 tickers today; signals reflect available set."
  ]
}
